title: Application Insights Metrics
description: Standard metrics related to Application Insights.

prerequisites.messageMarkdown: Ensure your application sends `request` and `dependency` telemetry to Application Insights. By default, Azure Monitor instrumentation libraries do this automatically.

Attach the `TargetingId` attribute to each span (request or dependency) if you plan to use these metrics in Online Experimentation. Without this identifier, data cannot be attributed to feature flag variants.
